title: Torrance $2495&up Spacious 2bd 2bath Pool, gym, sauna
posting_body: ['Prairie Gardens Apartments', '$2495&up Torrance   2 Bdrm +2 bath apartment.', 'Call for details.', '  w/pool, gym, sauna.', 'OPEN DAILY!', 'Call for details.', ' Available August and September,', 'Located in Torrance, Prairie Gardens features a beautiful setting for its spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments.', 'Quiet living in a garden atmosphere.', 'The South Bay area has many shopping centers, restaurants, movie theaters, excellent schools, and a variety of International markets.', 'Prairie Gardens is less than 5 miles from the beach, yet only 2 minutes from the 405 freeway.', 'Prairie Gardens is just blocks away from the extensive sports and recreation facility at Columbia Park.', 'Contact Manager:', 'Manager', '18150 S. Prairie Avenue', 'Torrance, CA 90504', 'show contact info', '18150 Prairie Avenue, Torrance, CA 90504', 'Google Map', 'Apartment Features', 'Semi-Private Entryways', 'Individual Patios or Balconies', 'Large Closet Areas', 'Vaulted Ceilings (upstairs units)', 'Cable Ready', 'Dishwashers', 'Electric Stoves', 'Outside Storage', 'Commercial Water Heaters', 'Indoor cats only (with pet deposit).', 'No dogs.', 'Community Features', 'Gym', "Gas BBQ's", 'Gated parking area', 'Private garages available', 'Telephone entry system', 'Three laundry rooms open 24 hours', 'Swimming pool', 'Close to Galleria Shopping Center', 'Also close to International markets', 'Two minutes to 405 freeway', 'Parking availability subject to change', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited service']
